about_the_game:
Fishing for Numbers is a vibrant, first-person educational adventure where you step into the shoes of an aspiring wizard on a quest to join the prestigious Arcane Anglers Guild. Master increasingly harder equations and catch magical fish to prove your worth and earn your place among the elite!

A unique way to learn math

Open portals to extraordinary math dimensions and unleash your fishing spells to summon magical fish. Harvest their essence to fuel your journey, upgrading your spells and empowering rune stones as you master the art of arcane mathematics!

Multiple game modes

Pick a game mode that fits the way you want to play. Classic Mode offers a preset challenge designed by the development team. Custom Mode lets you adjust the difficulty and rules to your liking.

Fun learning experience

The game offers a fun and engaging way to learn math, featuring rewarding visuals, a calming atmosphere, and a satisfying sense of progression and achievement.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4300 (2 * 1800) / AMD Athlon Dual Core 4450e (2 * 2300) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTX (768 MB) / Intel HD 4600 / Radeon HD 3850 (512 MB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
